Waco.Katy Park:
Katy Park was a baseball park located in Waco, TX and was used by many minor league baseball teams as well as the Baylor Bears for a short time. 


== Significant Moments ==
The New York Yankees played an exhibition game against the Waco Cubs on April 4, 1929. 
The first night game in Texas took place at Katy Park between the Kansas City Monarchs and Waco Black Cardinals under the Monarchs' portable light system on May 5, 1930.
